original_text: Jonathan was very angry. He got up from the table. He did not eat anything on that second day of the special meal. He was very upset because his father had insulted David.
korean_text: 심히 노하여 식탁에서 떠나고 그 달의 둘째 날에는 먹지 아니하였으니 이는 그의 아버지가 다윗을 욕되게 하였으므로 다윗을 위하여 슬퍼함이었더라

sentences.original_text: He got up from the table.
on that second day of the special meal.
because his father had insulted David.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그의 아버지가 다윗을 모욕했기 때문입니다.
